Cultural differences: Different cultures may have different norms, values, and expectations, leading to misunderstandings and conflicts during the summit.
Funding: Organizing an international peace summit can be expensive, and securing funding may be a challenge.
Security: Ensuring the safety of delegates and attendees is a top priority, and organizing such a large event can be difficult due to potential security threats.
Scheduling: Coordinating the schedules of delegates from different time zones can be challenging, and last-minute changes may disrupt the event.
Accessibility: Ensuring that the venue is accessible to all attendees, including those with disabilities, may be difficult and require additional planning.
